__e: Yeah, that's him. At first I thought I was making a fool of myself by coming down here.
Well, I don't think I was so far wrong, my boy. What do I look like, my dear?
It must be so; I cannot be mistaken.
That's how you can help me at the moment.
I once told you that your connections with the railways could be of help for me.
Since I left the college I've realised that I've learned nothing that might be useful to me in life.
For you learn to get in no matter what.
I started the will after doing the calendar this morning.
No-no. I'm already late because of bothering with you, people.
I'm so glad to have made such an interesting new friend today.
Look, I'm terribly sorry about this. I blame myself for not having been more clear in my letter, but...
And scared me halfout of my wits.
